item.title: FBI — FBI Seeking Information Related to Violent Activity at the U.S Capitol Building
item.description: The FBI is seeking information that will assist in identifying individuals who are actively instigating violence in Washington, DC. The FBI is accepting tips and digital media depicting rioting and violence in the U.S. Capitol Building and surrounding area in Washington, DC, on January 6, 2021.
